name: asgardeo-auth-react-sdk
description: Asgardeo Auth React SDK and Sample Apps

scripts.prebuild: yarn install && lerna run prebuild && lerna bootstrap
scripts.remove-node-modules: npx lerna exec -- rimraf -rf node_modules && rimraf -rf node_modules
scripts.remove-package-lock: npx lerna exec -- rimraf -rf package-lock.json && rimraf -rf package-lock.json
scripts.remove-yarn-lock: npx lerna exec -- rimraf -rf yarn.lock && rimraf -rf yarn.lock
scripts.clean-all: yarn run remove-package-lock && yarn run remove-yarn-lock && yarn run remove-node-modules

author: Asgardeo
